remarks: Polynomial evaluation for the 1 scalar.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Aug-2019.)
statement:
evl1at0.o $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1at0.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1at1.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
evl1at1.i $e |- I = ( 1r ` P ) $.
evl1at1 $p |- ( R e. CRing -> ( ( O ` I ) ` .1. ) = .1. ) $.
